name: Capsule Wars
description:
*WARNING* Contains strong flashing lights

Capsule's War is a retro arcade shooter with simple fps style controls, great music and proceduraly generated levels.

Features of this demo:

  • easy fps style controls: wsad to move, mouse to aim and shoot.
  • 5 waves of increasing difficulty and different weapons.
  • Pro-tip: beware of falling from the edges of the map.

Future intended release includes:

  • Story mode: Help Capsule fend off the terrible Evil Cube Lord that's trying to take over the world
  • Changing weapons
  • More stages for the survival mode with different themes (including enemies, weapons and music)
  • Power Ups!
  • And more.

This is an ongoing project which I started in college with no coding basics, but now with some experience, I'm actively working on it in order to turn it into an awesome game.

Please consider donating if you like the game and want to help me make it even better.
